name: Degradation(Alpha)
description:
Degradation's campain that is the same at the start but will change depending on what the player does in each area.
A completely open research tree lets you decide what you want as long as you have the resources(No need to research somthing rubbish to get to somthing good).

Your tanks are only the sum of their parts.
No power?(you cant move)
No ammo?(you cant shoot)
No Scanner?(no locking onto targets for you)


With 92 component slots inside the tanks body, 22 armour and 9 weapon slots you will kit you tank for each mission, researching new components and getting upgrades to old ones as you go.
Picking the correct components will be important alowing you to be equipped for the right situation and to not waste valuable resources
